text: Samples were placed into arginine broth, incubated at 35 ∘ C, and monitored four times daily for up to five days. Color change (indicating an alkaline pH shift) in the arginine broth prompted subculture of 50 L to an A7 agar plate. Plates were incubated anaerobically at 35 ∘ C for up to five days and examined daily with an inverted light microscope for
